trigger_prototype.expression: (avg(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#IFNAME}],15m)>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*last(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#IFNAME}]) or avg(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#IFNAME}],15m)>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*last(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#IFNAME}])) and last(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#IFNAME}])>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: avg(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#IFNAME}],15m)<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*last(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#IFNAME}]) and avg(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#IFNAME}],15m)<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*last(/Monitoramento - Huawei NE/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#IFNAME}])
trigger_prototype.name: Alta utilização de largura de banda (>{$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}%) na interface {#IFNAME} - {#IFALIAS}
Temperatura da Placa ou PSU Elevado - {#SNMPDESC}
